Class EventsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • use_cases.EventsManager

  • public class EventsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages events.

    • Method Detail

      • addEvent

        public java.util.UUID addEvent(java.lang.String name,
                               java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                               java.util.UUID roomId,
                               int capacity,
                               int duration,
                               java.util.List<RoomFeatures> features)
        Add event to the HashMap events.
        Parameters:
        name - a String object that represents the name of the event
        time - a LocalDateTime object that represents the start time of event
        roomId - UUID object that represents the room
        capacity - an integer object represents the maximum number of attendees allowed in th event
        duration - an integer object represents the duration of the event, in hours
        features - a list of RoomFeatures objects where each represent a feature that is required for the event
        Returns:
        the UUID of the newly created event

        public java.util.HashMap<java.util.UUID,Event> getAllEvents()
        Get and return all existing events.
        Returns:
        hashmap of event ids to events

      • getEventString

        public java.lang.String getEventString(java.util.UUID eventID)
        Get a string representation of the given event.
        Parameters:
        eventID - UUID object that represents the event
        Returns:
        a string representation of the given event which consists of the event name and the date and starting time of the event.

      • getAllEventIds

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getAllEventIds()
        Get a list of all events.
        Returns:
        a list of UUID objects where each UUID represents an unique event. The list will consist of UUID objects of all events.

      • getEventsByDay

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getEventsByDay(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Get a list of all events on a day
        Parameters:
        date - a LocalDate object that represents the day that user would like all events to be return
        Returns:
        a list of UUID objects where each UUID represents an unique event.

      • getNoConflictEventIds

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getNoConflictEventIds(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> conflictingEventIds)
        Get a list of events that have no date and time conflict with all events in a given list.
        Parameters:
        conflictingEventIds - A List of UUID objects where each UUID represents an unique event.
        Returns:
        A List of UUID objects where each UUID represents an unique event. The list consist of events that have no date and time conflict with any event in conflictingEventIds.
